name: More Speed Please!
description:
More Speed Please!

- Keep collecting coins & trade with your speed!

This is my first time learning Haxe & HaxeFlixel language. Have fun!

Instructions:

MOVE : WASD or arrow keys

TRADE : Release SPACE key or long press SPACE key.

Source Code:

https://github.com/Child3000/HaxeFlixel.MoreSpeedPlease
